QuestData.Title: A Physical Specimen
QuestData.Description: The soul is ready, but the body is not. For a skull as well-formed, as marvelous, as beautiful as this... we will need a suitable body.$b$bThe chief of the Bloodscalps, Gan'zulah, won his throne with brute force. If he still lives, you'll find him in Zul'Kunda, to the west.$b$bTaking his body won't be easy, but nothing a sturdy $c like yourself couldn't handle. Bring it back here when you're done.
QuestData.PortraitGiverText: Just... just look at that musculature.
QuestData.CompletionText: Gan'zulah was a brute and a tyrant. I've got a feeling that this troll will be different. This troll magic is easier than I thought it would be!
QuestData.RewardText: You have done well, $r. We have a head, a body, and some juju-voodoo-mojo nonsense. Now, just a little shock of electricity to get things started, and...
